vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀκατάγνωστος, ον,
not to be condemned, [LXX+NT+3rd c.AD+]adverb -τως unexceptionably, λογιστεύσας[Refs 3rd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: not condemned, what cannot be criticized
vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily not worthy of condemnation, cannot be criticized by a judge; hence, irreprehensible, Tit. 2:8*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: que no puede ser criticado legítimamente
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: để không ai có thể bắt bẻ; không chỗ trách
